posts.post_content:
Davidson, Indianapolis.  American Beauty 350 with border.  Beautiful card, EX condition.  SOLD

Kling, Chicago NL.  Sweet Caporal 350.  Another exceptional card, EX or better.  SOLD

Shulte, Chicago NL.  Front view, Piedmont 150.  EX, except for slight paper loss in tip of upper left border.  SOLD.                                                                                                                                       

Luther Taylor, Buffalo.  Piedmont 350 back.  Strong VG-EX with a bit of a diamond cut.  SOLD

Email for scans.

I'll take the Taylor.

Provide payment info to [url]jacklitsch@comcast.net[/url]

I will take the Kling.

Thanks

Martin - I have emailed, haven't heard back from you.  Please confirm that you still want the Kling, and have received payment info.  Thanks.

Mark
T206 Kling and Schulte are both still available.  $45 each.

Hi Mark, 

    I was just writing a check to you and referencing this post to verify the amount to send you. It was $50.00 for the Kling. We have had some incredible weather here with corresponding power outages but I did send you a couple of emails yesterday. You might want to check your spam folder. Anyway, let me know if the Kling is still available and whether you are receiving my emails.

Thanks and sincerely, Martin

Hi Martin,
You were right.  Your emails went into my spam folder, and so did a lot of others from board members.  I apologize to anyone who might have requested scans from me and was ignored.  I think the weather here has really messed up my email.  

Martin, I am holding the Kling for you, and understand that you do have my address to send a check.  Thanks, and sorry about the confusion!

Mark

Thanks Mark

I think we've had close to 80 inches so far this year and I think they are calling for more tomorrow night. Unbelievable....
Got the t206 Anderson today looks great and thanks for the fast shipping
